name: Crowded hospital
description:
Crowded hospital is a 3D visual novel, it's a game where you are called to manage a hospital. the particularity for this visual novel is that it takes place in a 3D environment, and choices you make influence the course of events.

Controls: with the mouse, you can look around you at 360° and validate your choices. The game is simple and mostly consist of answering yes or  no.

Language: English 

Read Time is an estimated 10-15 minutes

Future plans:

- More choices in dialogues;

- More endings/routes;

- Mini games;

Thanks for reading and i hope you enjoy the story
